description: The pro-Western party of President Milo Djukanovic appears to be one seat short of regaining power.
title: Montenegro election: Opposition parties eye tiny majority
title_page: Montenegro election: Opposition parties eye tiny majority - BBC News
maintext: He was not standing for election himself - but he was still very much the face of his Democratic Party of Socialists during the campaign. And it was his decision to pick a fight with the Serbian Orthodox Church which gifted his opponents the chance to declare that they really did have God on their side.
